data.title: Manchester City midfielder Ilkay Gundogan open to Borussia Dortmund return later in his career – talkSPORT
data.meta_description: Manchester City midfielder Ilkay Gundogan is open to rejoining Borussia Dortmund in the future. The 25-year-old left the German side for the Etihad this summer in a deal worth around £20m. Gun…
data.text:
Manchester City midfielder Ilkay Gundogan is open to rejoining Borussia Dortmund in the future.

The 25-year-old left the German side for the Etihad this summer in a deal worth around £20m.

Gundogan spent five successful years at Dortmund, helping them win the Bundesliga.

The Germany international is now determined to make his mark in the Premier League, but admits he could return to his former club in the latter stages of his career.

"If it was the case [returning to Dortmund] in the next one or two years, I would probably not be happy about it," Gundogan told Sport Bild.

"Because it would probably mean that I have failed or not developed myself.

"If I'm 29 or 30, I do not know if [Dortmund would] still want me. Basically, I would not exclude the possibility, but now I have other big targets."
